name: Intrinsic Alchemy Asset
summary: An IGZ file is a 3D model, skeleton, texture, or other asset used in an Intrinsic Alchemy Engine video game. In most cases, it contains a character or item that appears in a game, or it contains a texture to be applied to a character or item. IGZ files are most notably used in Crash Bandicoot N. Sane Trilogy, a game published by Activision in 2017.
